#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

long long input()
{
    long long n=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c < '0' || c >'9') {c=getchar_unlocked();}
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
        n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}

long long GCD(long long A, long long B){
	long long temp;
	if(A < B){
		temp = A;
		A = B;
		B = temp;
	}
	while(B != 0){
		temp = A%B;
		A = B; 
		B = temp;
	}
	return A;
}

int main(){
	int T;
	long long A, B, gcd;
	T = input();
	while(T--){
		A = input();
		B = input();
		while(1){
			if(B == 1){
				cout << "Yes" << endl;
				break;
			}
			gcd = GCD(A,B);
			if(gcd == 1){
				cout << "No" << endl;
				break;
			}
			B /= gcd;
		}
	}
}
